Web Services Page (Installer Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

Use this page of the Installer Properties dialog box to configure the available Web services to include with an installer. View the available Web services in the LabVIEW Project Explorer window. When you include a Web service with an installer and deploy that installer to a target computer, the installer deploys the Web service to the web server of the target computer.

This page includes the following component:

  • Web services—Lists the available Web services for the target to which this build specification belongs.
